name: Resident Evil 4 Ultimate HD Edition
description:
Resident Evil 4 Ultimate HD Edition is an action game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Capcom. On review aggregator Metacritic, Resident Evil 4 Ultimate HD Edition has a score of 83. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Resident Evil 4 Ultimate HD Edition on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.
